data.name: Notes From Province: Notes from the Developer e-booklet
data.detailed_description:
Send a "thank you tip" to the developer! Donate to unlock the Notes from the Developer e-booklet, containing descriptions of cut storylines, behind the scenes trivia, and random ramblings from the Developer.

This DLC contains the short e-booklet in pdf format. It has no new content or cosmetic rewards. Only buy this if you wish to thank BoxFox Studios for the 7 years of hard work put into this game.

Thank you for your generosity!

Viewing the e-booklet
1. Open Steam and find Notes From Province in your Library games list.
2. Right-click on the game's icon, select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse... button.
4. Find the PDF file named "Notes from the Developer"

See the Steam Support FAQ for more details:
https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/720F-F7D3-0EB2-059F

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
